OUTLINE : This dose-escalation , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord age ( 2 11 v 12 17 ) . Patients receive caspofungin acetate IV 1 hour daily 4 28 day absence need start standard empirical antifungal therapy , breakthrough fungal infection , deterioration patient condition , unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 16 patient ( 8 per stratum ) receive caspofungin acetate 1 2 dose level . Caspofungin acetate escalate dose level 2 1 8 patient experience dose-limiting toxicity dose level 1 . Patients follow 14 day . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 32-64 patient ( 16 per dose level ( cohort ) , 8 per stratum ) accrue study .
